mapper.sql: id, username, school_num, nickname, phone, email, photo_src, sex
mapper.select:
select `name`, p.email as "email", p.major as "major.id", src, status, isNew, m.major as "major.major", s.school as "major.school.school" from tb_user u, tb_poor p, tb_major m, tb_school s where 1 and u.id=p.u_id and m.id=p.major and s.id=m.s_id and u.id=p.u_id
and u.id=#{uId}
